required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Evaluation of the Efficacy, Safety, and Tolerability of LevoCept
clinical_study.official_title: A Phase 3, Prospective, Multi-Center, Single-Arm, Open-Label Study to Evaluate LevoCept™, a Long-Acting Reversible Intrauterine System for Contraceptive Efficacy, Safety, and Tolerability

brief_summary.textblock: To assess the contraceptive efficacy (prevention of pregnancy) of LevoCept

detailed_description.textblock:
Study Design:
Prospective, multi-center, single-arm, open-label, Phase 3 clinical study to 3 years with extension up to 5 years
Number of Subjects:
Approximately 1,525 subjects will be enrolled into the study
Study Population:
Post-menarcheal, pre-menopausal women up to age 45 years, who are at risk for pregnancy and who desire a long-term intrauterine contraceptive for birth control will be eligible for this study.

primary_outcome.measure: Contraceptive efficacy through 3 years of use as calculated by the Pearl Index

secondary_outcome.measure: Contraceptive efficacy at Years 4 and 5 as calculated by the Pearl Index
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Years 4 and 5 and cumulatively through Years 4 and 5

secondary_outcome.description: Ease of LevoCept placement will be summarized for the Safety population as reported by the investigator (Very easy, Easy, Neither Easy nor Hard, Hard, Very Hard).
The number of subjects with either a successful or unsuccessful placement will be summarized

secondary_outcome.measure: Insertion pain assessed immediately after insertion
secondary_outcome.description: Summarized for subjects with and without prior prophylactic pain medication as measured by an 11-Point Numeric Pain Rating Scale. The scale being 0 - 10 with 0 being no pain and 10 being the worse pain
Continuation rates at Years 1, 2, 3, 4 and 5, Reasons for discontinuation will be summarized.

secondary_outcome.measure: Return to Fertility. Only for subjects requesting LevoCept removal to become pregnant.
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Subjects will be followed for either 1 year, until they decide to no longer try to conceive or they become pregnant, whichever comes first.

secondary_outcome.measure: Release rate of LNG from the IUS and resulting pharmacokinetics of LNG (PK substudy)
